entry.title: You’ve learned the syntax, now level up your coding

link.title: You’ve learned the syntax, now level up your coding

entry.summary: So you’ve read a few books, followed a few tutorials, maybe attended a bootcamp. By now you should know the syntax pretty well, but to be able to work comfortably with a language or pass technical interviews you will need to build fluency in it. This is not unlike building virtuosity on a musical instrument, except in this case rather than practicing pieces of music you hack away at coding exercises.
